title: #22 - That Episode with Sexless in the City Author Kat Harris
description:
How do you embrace your sexuality when you’re not having sex?

This week’s guest has such a unique story and lives such a unique life… and is the perfect person to talk about this!

Meet Kat Karris!

Kat Harris is a Brooklyn-based online educator, digital content creator, female empowerment advocate. Her vision is for women to know their beauty, identity and value. She is co-founder of the The Refined Woman and the host of The Redefined Collective Podcast. Her new book “Sexless in the City: A Sometimes Sassy, Sometimes Painful, Always Honest Look at Dating, Desire, and Sex” comes out in April. 

Visit The Refined Woman

Find Kat on Instagram

Check out Kat’s podcast, The Redefined Collective

Pre-order Kat’s new book, “Sexless in the City: A Sometimes Sassy, Sometimes Painful, Always Honest Look at Dating, Desire, and Sex”
